product_name: The North Face Crevasse Laptop Pack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Crevasse laptop pack from The North Face pairs cool vintage-inspired design with durable, technical materials for a pack that can handle the rigors of travel without giving up style. Top loading, padded main compartment protects up to a 15 in. laptop; interior attached neoprene sleeve holds up to a 10 in. tablet. Large exterior compartment holds file folders, magazines and books, and includes a zip mesh pocket. Dense foam-padded back panel with breathable mesh fabric and an airflow channel make the pack easy to carry and helps your back remain cool. Adjustable shaped shoulder straps with height-adjustable sternum strap and built-in whistle; stowable padded hipbelt. The North Face Crevasse laptop pack includes 2 water-resistant front organization pockets; 4 side compression straps and a leather carry handle. Also includes 2 leather lash patches on the bottom of pack and a hiking pole lash strap. Closeout.
short_description: The Crevasse laptop pack from The North Face pairs cool vintage-inspired design with durable, technical materials for a pack that can handle the rigors of travel without giving up style.
